name: Eye of the Goblin Lord: A Knight's Descent into Darkness
name_original: Eye of the Goblin Lord: A Knight's Descent into Darkness
description:
Summary

Embark on a perilous adventure through the treacherous depths of the Dark Goblin's Dungeon. Play as a valiant knight and test your mettle against vicious goblin foes and their monstrous dark lord. Navigate through winding corridors and gather valuable loot to aid you in your quest. Do you have what it takes to emerge victorious and claim your place as a hero?

It's our first released game!
Play and enjoy!

Made in 7 days for   7DRL Challenge 2023

Controls:

WASD - Move ;      W/E - attack;      S- defense;      R - restart ;     Ecs - pause menu;     

M - mute sound;  Map - right side of the screen

Credits:

Game Design - Feliciano Creadoros

Programming - Feliciano Creadoros, MrSvidur

Animation and design - MrSvidur, Feliciano Creadoros.

Sound- Feliciano Creadoros
